content: these simple socks are an easy introduction for new sock knitters or a quick and chunky bed sock for those that know what they are doing the socks are worked from the toe up using circular needles and magic loop and have a german short row heel there may be some new techniques that you will need to look up but they will be a great addition to your knitting toolkit **sizes** eur size 36 38 40 or 22 5 24 25 cm or whatever length you like **yarn** approximately 60g-100g of 8ply yarn our sample fits a size 41 and weighs 80g per pair we used a mix of millpost merino woolganics and white gum wool yarns but any 8ply yarn would be fine **needles** 3 25-3 50mm 80cm circular needles depending on your gauge optional 80cm circular needle 1 or 2 sizes smaller for tighter ribbing
